Package br.com.azalim.stockmarket

Class StockMarket

java.lang.Object
br.com.azalim.stockmarket.StockMarket
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable<TransactionObserver>
public class StockMarket extends Object implements Observable<TransactionObserver>
Represents the stock market.

  • Constructor Details

    • StockMarket

      public StockMarket(Collection<Company> companies, Collection<Broker> brokers)
      Creates a new stock market.
      Parameters:
      companies - the companies of the stock market.
      brokers - the brokers of the stock market.

  • Method Details

    • getOperationBook

      public OperationBook getOperationBook(Asset asset)
      Retrieves the operation book of a given asset.
      Parameters:
      asset - the asset of the operation book.
      Returns:
      the operation book of the given asset or null if it does not exist.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the asset does not exist.

    • getOperationBooks

      public Map<Asset,OperationBook> getOperationBooks()
      Returns:
      the unmodifiable map of all the operation books of the stock market.

    • getBrokers

      public Set<Broker> getBrokers()
      Returns:
      the unmodifiable set of all the brokers of the stock market.

    • startProcessingOperations

      public void startProcessingOperations()
      Starts processing the registered operations every one second.

    • stopProcessingOperations

      public void stopProcessingOperations()
      Shutdowns the executor service that processes the registered operations.

    • notifyTransactionObservers

      public void notifyTransactionObservers(Broker from, Broker to, Asset asset, int quantity, double price)
      Notifies the observers that a new transaction has been registered.
      Parameters:
      from - the broker that sold the asset.
      to - the broker that bought the asset.
      asset - the asset that was bought and sold.
      quantity - the quantity of the asset that was bought and sold.
      price - the price of the asset that was bought and sold.

    • observe

      public void observe(TransactionObserver observer)
      Subscribes to be notified of new transactions registered to the stock market.
      Specified by:
      observe in interface Observable<TransactionObserver>
      Parameters:
      observer - the observer that is going to be notified when new transactions are registered.

    • getObservers

      public Collection<TransactionObserver> getObservers()
      Specified by:
      getObservers in interface Observable<TransactionObserver>
      Returns:
      the observers that are going to be notified when there is a new transaction registered.

    • getInstance

      public static StockMarket getInstance()
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of stock market. Will always return null when unit testing.
